languages.text: "Тени сгущаются. Какое будущее ждет Простор Коронус?"
"The shadows around us grow darker. What does the future hold for the Koronus Expanse?"
languages.original_text: "Тени сгущаются. Какое будущее ждет Простор Коронус?"

traits.locale_text: "The shadows around us grow darker. What future awaits the Koronus Expanse?"
"The shadows around us grow darker. What future awaits the Koronus Expanse?"
"The shadows around us grow darker. What does the future hold for the Koronus Expanse?"
"The shadows around us grow darker. What does the future hold for the Koronus Expanse?"
"The shadows around us grow darker. What does the future hold for the Koronus Expanse?"
"The shadows around us grow darker. What does the future hold for the Koronus Expanse?"

languages.text: «Las sombras que nos envuelven se han oscurecido aún más. ¿Qué le depara el futuro a la Extensión de Koronus?».
languages.original_text: "The shadows around us grow darker. What does the future hold for the Koronus Expanse?"

traits.locale_text: «Las sombras que nos envuelven se han oscurecido aún más. ¿Qué le depara el futuro a la Extensión de Koronus?».

languages.text: 「周囲の影が濃さを増しているコロヌス・エクスパンスにどんな未来が待ち受けているのだ？」
languages.original_text: "The shadows around us grow darker. What does the future hold for the Koronus Expanse?"

traits.locale_text: 「周囲の影が濃さを増しているコロヌス・エクスパンスにどんな未来が待ち受けているのだ？」

languages.text: “我们周围的阴影越来越浓，科罗努斯扩区的未来会变成什么样子？”
languages.original_text: "The shadows around us grow darker. What does the future hold for the Koronus Expanse?"

traits.locale_text: “我们周围的阴影越来越浓，科罗努斯扩区的未来会变成什么样子？”

languages.text: "Die Schatten um uns herum werden dunkler. Was hält die Zukunft für die Koronus-Ausdehnung bereit?"
languages.original_text: "The shadows around us grow darker. What does the future hold for the Koronus Expanse?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Schatten um uns herum werden dunkler. Was hält die Zukunft für die Koronus-Ausdehnung bereit?"

languages.text: « Les ombres s'épaississent autour de nous. Qu'est-ce que l'avenir réserve aux Étendues de Koronus ? »
languages.original_text: "The shadows around us grow darker. What does the future hold for the Koronus Expanse?"

traits.locale_text: « Les ombres s'épaississent autour de nous. Qu'est-ce que l'avenir réserve aux Étendues de Koronus ? »

languages.text: "Çevremizi saran gölgeler kararıyor. Gelecekte Koronus Enginliği'ni neler bekliyor?"
languages.original_text: "The shadows around us grow darker. What does the future hold for the Koronus Expanse?"
